text: innum (napiye! Nayavancakarkalukku) nir kattalaiyittal, niccayamakap (porukkup) purappatuvataka allahvin mitu urutiyakac cattiyam ceytu kurukirarkal; (avarkalai nokki)"ninkal cattiyam ceyyatirkal. (Unkal) kilpatital terintu tan niccayamaka allah ninkal ceypavarrai nankaripavan" enru kuruviraka
